description: Defines an Angular component 'LogoIllustrationComponent' responsible for rendering the application logo, either as an SVG or image, with inputs for customization.

classes.name: LogoIllustrationComponent
classes.description: An Angular standalone component that renders a logo illustration with customizable image source and alt text.

methods.name: LogoIllustrationComponent
methods.description: Constructor for the LogoIllustrationComponent, default methods are implicit in this file.
